page.title: 10EDUCATION IN DUNS CONTD.
page.content: {NURSERY EDUCATION}IS ORGANISED PRIVATELY FIVE DAYS A WEEK. THE AIM IS TO GIVE CHILDREN THE OPPORTUNITY FOR SOCIAL INTERACTION. {SPECIAL EDUCATION}INCLUDES LANARK LODGE, A DAY CENTRE FOR THE PROFOUNDLY HANDICAPPED, AS WELL AS THE UNITS IN PRIMARY & SECONDARY SCHOOLS. THE UNIT TEACHES 5 CHILDREN & 40 ADULTS. IT SERVES A WIDE AREA & TEACHES LIFE SKILLS, INCLUDING GARDENING, HOUSEKEEPING SKILLS & CRAFTS. THE CENTRE IS WELL EQUIPPED. {FURTHER EDUCATION}IS MAINLY AT THE BORDERS COLLEGE. COURSES IN AGRICULTURE, AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING, SECRETARIAL STUDIES, BUILDING, JOINERY & NURSERY NURSING ARE PROVIDED FOR DAY STUDENTS. EVENING CLASSES IN WELDING, MOTOR MAINTAINANCE, STICK DRESSING, TYPING, ART & COMPUTING ARE AVAILABLE. A NEW MACHINERY WORKSHOP IS WELL USED.
